name: TGS
author: pali (pali#0439)
short: Cog to manage Space Station 13 running on TGS.
description: Cog to manage Space Station 13 running on TGS.
install_msg:
You will need to set RedBot API keys for your TGS instance like this:
`]set api tgs user,exampleusername password,examplepassword host,https://tgs.example.com`
